commit.message: Fix VS2013 build break in libconsensus.
Make narrowing conversions explicit, eliminate forcing to bool.
Fix unused variable warning in NDEBUG builds.
Remove USE_SECP256K1 conditinal code (not yet supported).
Remove NDEBUG condition (NDEBUG builds not yet supported).
Change MSC_VER to _MSC_VER in consensus header.

files.patch:
@@ -19,7 +19,7 @@
   #elif defined(HAVE_FUNC_ATTRIBUTE_VISIBILITY)
     #define EXPORT_SYMBOL __attribute__ ((visibility ("default")))
   #endif
-#elif defined(MSC_VER) && !defined(STATIC_LIBBITCOINCONSENSUS)
+#elif defined(_MSC_VER) && !defined(STATIC_LIBBITCOINCONSENSUS)
   #define EXPORT_SYMBOL __declspec(dllimport)
 #endif

commit.message: Fix C++11 warning on enum init trailing commas (consensus files).
